lines.text: Doc? I ain't no doctor. But get off my treasure crest, or you'll be needing one. A doctor, that is.
I am the captain of this here ship and a right captain too.
Now, that looks like the beginning of a beautiful friendship. But what I don't understand is why anybody but me would want 18 carrots anyway.
Aw, come on, come on, don't be a baby.
But I might get all wet.
Aw, shut up and start drowning. Ohh, I hate a poor spot. Oh, I'm tired of your shillying and your shallying.
Golden girls? Why you didn't you say so? Come on, let's go.
You might try jumping on it.
I'm calling little buttercup. Dear little butterchup though I could never tell why?
But you're called buttercup, dear little buttercup.
Buttercup pie? Ooh, I love buttercup pie. Kiss me, my fool.
